i.name: Eternal Hunger
i.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

q.name: Jaws of the Beast
q.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

w.name: Blood Hunt
w.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

e.name: Primal Howl
e.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

r.name: Infinite Duress
r.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

i1.blurb: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Warwick's''' basic attacks deal {{pp|10 to 44}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} [[on-hit]].

While {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}} he is also {{tip|heal|healed}} by the amount of post-mitigation damage ''Eternal Hunger'' deals. This healing is increased by 150% while {{as|{{sti|health|below 25% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.name: Eternal Hunger
notes: * The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Eternal Hunger's'' damage cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, nor does it affect structures.
* ''Eternal Hunger's'' damage will not be applied if the enhanced attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if ''Warwick'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

riot.name: Eternal Hunger
riot.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

riot.name: Jaws of the Beast
riot.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
riot.tooltip:
Warwick lunges forward and bites his target. While the key is held down, he will attach to the target then leap behind them.

On release, deals {{ a1 }}+{{ a2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of your target's maximum health as magic damage (applies On Hit effects). Heal {{ e3 }}% of damage dealt.

While attached, Warwick follows any movements they make and cannot be displaced.

q1.blurb: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dashes}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target enemy and bites them, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, applying [[on-hit effects]] and {{sti|healing}} himself for a portion of the damage dealt.

If ''Jaws of the Beast'' is held, '''Warwick''' will lock his teeth into his target and use them to swing himself around to their far side. '''Warwick''' is {{tip|pacify|unable to act}} while swinging around his target, and will move wherever they move until he jumps off. '''Warwick''' cannot be {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while attached to an enemy.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{as|120% AD}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 8}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Healing Percentage|{{ap|30 to 70}}%}}
q1.name: Jaws of the Beast
notes: * The ability will not cancel if the target dies during its cast time.
* '''Warwick''' cannot be {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while attached to an enemy, but can be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} prior to reaching them.
* The button must be held until Warwick reaches his target to trigger the second effect.

* While ''Jaws of the Beast'' does not use Quick Casting by default, click-and-hold is comparable to the input required to use {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} or {{ai|Decimating Smash|Sion}} while using Quick Casting. It does not accept two-click input (e.g. First Cast and Second Cast) that Standard Casters will be used to on the aforementioned abilities.

riot.name: Blood Hunt
riot.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Warwick gains {{ e2 }}% attack speed against enemies below 50% health. He also senses low health champions globally, moving {{ e1 }}% faster toward them when out of combat. These bonuses are tripled against enemies below 20% health.

Active: Warwick briefly senses all enemies. The nearest sensed champion is Blood Hunted for 8 seconds. Cast only while not in combat with a champion.

While no enemies are being hunted, Blood Hunt cools down twice as fast.

w1.blurb: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
w1.cooldown: {{tt|{{ap|120 to 60}}|Cools down twice as fast while not Blood Hunting}}
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Warwick''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} against all enemies {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
Enemy {{tip|champions}} below that amount are also ''Blood Hunted'', granting him {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while facing them as well as highlighting their position to his team.
The '''bonus''' movement and attack speed is increased against enemy champions {{as|{{sti|health|below 20% '''maximum''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' briefly senses all enemies and then ''Blood Hunts'' the nearest enemy champion within a large radius for 8 seconds, regardless of their {{as|{{sti|health|'''current''' health}}}}.

After being in combat with a champion ''Blood Hunt'' may only be activated passively for 3 seconds. Its bonus movement speed will also be lost for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, but will build up again every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|50 to 110}}%|Enhanced Attack Speed|{{ap|50*2.5 to 110*2.5}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|35 to 55}}%|Enhanced Movement Speed|{{ap|35*2.5 to 55*2.5}}%}}
w1.name: Blood Hunt
notes: * ''Blood Hunt'' can detect and target [[Champion_summoned_units#decoys|decoys]].
* '''Warwick''' will lose his movement speed bonus if enemies that are not ''Blood Hunted'' stay exactly between him and the ''Blood Hunted'' target.

* ''Blood Hunt's'' passive only senses enemies that go below the {{as|health}} threshold while '''Warwick''' is alive. A unit that went below 50% health while '''Warwick''' was dead and has not taken damage while he is alive will not be detected by ''Blood Hunt'' until it falls low again.

** Same applies to enemy champions that went under the threshold by taking [[Nexus Obelisk]] damage or to units that spawn with their current health below the threshold (i.e {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}).

* The detection from ''Blood Hunt'' is more similar to {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Tremor Sense}} than a form of sight - it grants positional information only. It does not explicitly inform '''Warwick''' about who is low health or if they are alone.

* '''Warwick''' will also see a "blood trail" highlighting the shortest path to ''Blood Hunted'' targets. While described as a trail, this does '''not''' indicate where the target has been - only the quickest route to their current location, and it will update as you and/or the target move.

* Revealed enemies who are below {{as|50% '''maximum''' health}} will display a red wolf mark on their heads while ominous music will replace the Summoner's Rift default chosen song until they have gone above {{as|50% '''current''' hp}}, with a small delay. Warwick's allies will receive no information, the blood trail is only visible to '''Warwick''' and the ominous music will only play to people passively or actively marked with ''Blood Hunt''.

riot.name: Primal Howl
riot.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
riot.tooltip: Warwick gains {{ e1 }}% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end of the duration, or if activated again, Warwick howls, causing all nearby enemies to flee for {{ e3 }} second.

e1.blurb: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Warwick''' reduces all incoming damage for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. After 1 second, ''Primal Howl'' can be re-activated, and automatically does so after {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Warwick''' unleashes a howl, ending the damage reduction in the process, and causes all nearby enemies to {{tip|flee}} for 1 second as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90%.
Landing {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} will instantly reactivate ''Primal Howl'' without prematurely ending the damage reduction buff.
e1.name: Primal Howl
notes: * The second activation will cancel '''Warwick's''' basic attack.
** '''Warwick''' cannot attack during the animation.

riot.name: Infinite Duress
riot.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
riot.tooltip: Warwick leaps 2.5 seconds worth of movement speed in a direction, suppressing the first champion he collides with for {{ rduration }} seconds. Deals <magicDamage>{{ damagecumulative }}</magicDamage> magic damage and applies on-hit effects 3 times. Warwick heals for 100% of all damage he deals during Infinite Duress.

r1.blurb: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} in the target direction, {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} the first champion he collides with for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

'''Warwick''' {{tip|channels}} while the target is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} by hitting the target up to 6 times while also applying [[on-hit effects]] up to 3 times. ''Infinite Duress'' {{sti|heals}} '''Warwick''' for all the damage dealt.
r1.name: Infinite Duress
notes: * The dash will be interrupted instantly if an enemy flashes in front of '''Warwick'''.

* The minimum range of the ability is 275 units, based on the minimum movement speed that a champion can have (110) while still being able to move. The "base" range of this ability is {{fd|837.5}} because of his 335 base movement speed.
* The 6 hits are done in cycles of 2 hits every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The first hit deals 2/9 of the total damage and triggers the on-hit effects once while the second hit deals 1/9 of it.
* The healing is increased by {{sti|life steal}}.
* ''Infinite Duress'' can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} and won't deal any damage while {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
** {{cai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}} will only block one hit.
r1.target_range: {{tt|{{as|250% '''current''' Movement Speed}}|The range can change mid-air, potentially stopping the dash}}
